title: Alpex Solar to double PV module capacity to 2.4 GW by FY26
description: Alpex Solar plans to double its photovoltaic solar module capacity to 2.4 GW by FY2025-26. A new 1.2 GW project will be set up in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh. The company is also exploring solar cell manufacturing and aims for deeper integration in the solar industry.
